questions.question: Is high capital expenditure (CapEx) a typical advantage of cloud computing?
Does a public cloud deployment provide resources exclusively for one organization?

Is Azure Stack an example of private cloud technology?

questions.purpose: Test understanding of cloud service models and their shared responsibility.
scoring_criteria: Explains what users manage in each model
Explains what the provider manages in each model
Gives at least one example per model

questions.question: List and describe three financial benefits of cloud computing compared to traditional on-premises IT.
questions.purpose: Assess knowledge of cloud financial advantages.

questions.purpose: Assess understanding of the division of responsibilities between cloud providers and customers.

scoring_criteria: Provides two different hybrid cloud scenarios

Relates answer to business or compliance needs
